page.title: 11Trade Mr. Sherry Greyhounds
page.content: Alders Farm House is over a hundred years old and was originally a labourers cottage. Mr. Sherry has bred and trained greyhounds for 2\ years in Fyfield but previously bred them in Ireland for twenty years. He is more interested in training than breeding the dogs. Sunny his oldest dog has won every race it has run. It is now seven years old and is treated as a family pet. Mr. Sherry has about 50 greyhounds. The greyhounds have a breakfast consisting of tea and toast - sometimes they have an egg with it. Vitamin tablets are mixed in. For their main meal they have soup soaked on to a rusk & they have meat too. The greyhounds are worth a thousand pounds each.
